document.full_text: hedge fund founder raj rajaratnam and his family have invested $25 million in a $35 million fund managed by one of his former top executives who testified at rajaratnam's insider trading trial, the jury heard on thursday.
document.title: rajaratnam invests in fund run by trial witness
lines_and_colors: hedge fund founder raj rajaratnam and his family have invested $25 million in a $35 million fund managed by one of his former top executives who testified at rajaratnam's insider trading trial, the jury heard on thursday.
